text.more:
From a JSON file from Atlas Academy, custom C and awk code was written to parse the JSON (because I can't deal with javascript) into a workable csv. 
This csv summarizes the voicelines from each servant id to the others
A python script writes this into a dot file (since originally graphviz was used to generate, all graphviz images are also provided)
This dot file is imported into gephi, which uses a plugin to export this. 

All code I made is also included on this page, somewhere.
text.intro: Each character in FGO may have direct voicelines for each other; this graph visualizes those direct connections.
text.title: Servant Voicelines
